original: DUHS, Sven Folke, Kamrer, Stockholm, f Molkom 29/6 14 av konstnär G W D o Karin Laurell, gm Birgit Lundin. Realex Krist 30, hdlskurs Bar-Lock-Inst 31, Sthlms borg.sk o Sthlms stds hdls- o yrkessk (eng, ty, fr, sp, ry språken) 32—43, kurser i bokf, skattelagar, självdekl o matem v Hermods 36. Anst AB B A Hjorth & Co Sthlm sed. 31, först ss kont o korr, sederm ss bokf.ch o sed. 38 ss kamrer. Företagit semesterresor till grannländerna. Medl Sällsk W6. Hobbies: Fotografering o friluftsliv.
translated: DUHS, Sven Folke, Accountant, Stockholm, born in Molkom on June 29, 1914, to artist G.W.D and Karin Laurell. Married to Birgit Lundin. Graduated from Kristina Realskola in 1930, attended a commercial course at Bar-Lock Institute in 1931. Studied at Stockholm City Business School and Stockholm City Vocational School (English, German, French, Spanish, and Russian languages) from 1932 to 1943. Completed courses in bookkeeping, tax laws, self-assessment, and mathematics at Hermods in 1936. Employed by AB B.A. Hjorth & Co in Stockholm since 1931, initially as a clerk and correspondent, later as an accountant in 1938. Took vacations to neighboring countries. Member of Society W6. Hobbies include photography and outdoor activities.

education.description: Studied English, German, French, Spanish, and Russian languages
